reset-start-description: If you've forgotten your account's password, we can email a unique temporary link to your inbox. Then, you can follow that link to securely reset your account's password.
reset-email-sent-confirmation: We've sent you the email successfully. Please check your inbox to proceed.
reset-finish-description: Now, you can set a new password for your account.
reset-account-password-confirmation: You have successfully reset your account's password.
